name: Blood Rush
description:
{Warning, Blood Rush contains strong language!}

 You awaken to a knock on your door in the middle of the night... damnit it's those damn cultists again. I'm sick of this, time to do something about it. Sit back, strap up and get bhopping in this PSX style FPS. Collect flesh to awaken your hatred for these bastards and become their judgement day.

{Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022}

{Level Design- John Saunders}

{Technical Design & Programming- https://twitter.com/slammeddev}
